import TimeSetting from "./timeset" import { api_post } from "./api" import { useState } from "react"; const Quizcustompage = () =>{ function handlefile(files){ let file_reader=new FileReader(); file_reader.onloadend= async (files)=>{ let contents= files.result; console.log(contents) setfile(contents) } file_reader.readAsText(files) } return (
handlefile(e.target.files[0])} className="block bg-sky-100 w-full text-sm text-gray-900 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg cursor-pointer bg-gray-50 dark:text-gray-400 focus:outline-none dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:placeholder-gray-400" />
) } export default Quizcustompage;
